title: Sentence Pair Scoring: Towards Unified Framework for Text Comprehension
abstract: We review the task of Sentence Pair Scoring, popular in the literature in various forms --- slanted as Answer Sentence Selection, Paraphrasing, Semantic Text Scoring, Next Utterance Ranking, Recognizing Textual Entailment or e.g. a component of Memory Networks.
histories: submitted as long paper to ACL 2016
submitted as long paper to ACL 2016
